```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(leaps)
```

```{r}
model_location   <- read_csv(here("clean_data/clean_location.csv"))
model_location <- model_location %>% 
  filter(breakdown_of_domestic_tourism == "Expenditure") %>% 
  select(-units, -breakdown_of_domestic_tourism) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(year, type_of_location_visited), 
                ~as.factor(.x)))

model_location
```
 
 
```{r}
regsubsets_forward <- regsubsets(value ~ ., data = model_location, nvmax = 8, method = "forward")
```
 
 
```{r}
summary(regsubsets_forward)
```
 
 
```{r}
plot(regsubsets_forward, scale = "adjr2")
```

```{r}
mod1 <- lm(value ~ year + type_of_location_visited, data = model_location)
summary(mod1)
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(mod1)
```
